alert.note: Alert for Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:39PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MARIPOSA AND CENTRAL TUOLUMNE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM PDT... At 537 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just east of Hetch Hetchy and just west of Tuolumne Meadows. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Isolated high rainfall rates could lead to nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Isolated high rainfall rates could lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Glen Aulin High Sierra Camp, Tenaya Lake, and May Lake High Sierra Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Yosemite NP outside of the valley
